medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient had a 6-month history of daily short-lived urticaria occurring on the face, trunk, and extremities. Compressing the skin invariably caused a wheal response.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Asthma with specific IgE against Dermatophagoides farinae.
medical_history.family_history: No family history of chronic urticaria or angioedema.
